com.frdfsnlght.transporter.api

Class RemoteLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.frdfsnlght.transporter.api.RemoteLocation

  • public final class RemoteLocation
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a location in a remote world on a remote server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RemoteLocation(RemoteServer server, RemoteWorld world, double x, double y, double z)
      Creates a remote location for the specified server, world, and coordinates.
      RemoteLocation(java.lang.String serverName, java.lang.String worldName, double x, double y, double z)
      Creates a remote location for the specified server, world, and coordinates.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RemoteServer getRemoteServer()
      Returns the remote server where this location is located.
      RemoteWorld getRemoteWorld()
      Returns the remote world where this location is located.
      double getX()
      Returns the x-ordinate of this location.
      double getY()
      Returns the y-ordinate of this location.
      double getZ()
      Returns the z-ordinate of this location.
